FuncDef: The display dhcp option-60 command displays the vendor-class configuration.
Examples: Vendor-class(dhcpv4 option60/dhcpv6 option16) has exact match.
Vendor-class(dhcpv4 option60/dhcpv6 option16) has sub-option 10 and sub-offset 2 and sub-length 3 and offset 1.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command displays dhcp option-60 and vendor-class configurations.
The displayed information includes whether the customized vendor-class option contains the domain name, and whether the customized vendor-class option adopts fuzzy match or exact match.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
